title: 5-Year-Old Killed In Greensboro, Suspected Shooter Still Wanted
content:
GREENSBORO, N.C. -- The Greensboro Police Department is looking for the man who shot and killed a 5-year-old Friday night.
According to police, 22-year-old Murad Anthony Weaver shot 5-year-old Caleb Harris Pearson at a home on Waugh Street around 11:30 p.m. Pearson was taken to a local hospital where he later died.
Investigators say the boy was at the home with his mother, who was providing medical care for someone in the house.
Police say there was a fight between the mother, Weaver, and another person in the home before the shooting.
Police have issued a first degree murder warrant for Weaver. If you have any information on where he may be, call Crime Stoppers at (336) 373-1000.
